title: Should we mint and issue 250k TRDL to the Strudel Treasury?
body:
We strongly believe that the smartest course of action currently is to mint and issue 250,000 $TRDL totalling 11.52% of the circulating supply to the Strudel Treasury. We believe these funds to be critical for capitalizing on the opportunities that are currently available to us in the market. Once issued, we plan to deploy these funds in three main areas:

- Marketing
- Exchange listing fees
- Liquidity incentives

Please read the full Strudel Funding Proposal here: 

https://strudel-finance.medium.com/strudel-funding-proposal-1db3526f7dec
author: 0x683028Fc63477B8A702CFE7475865952d3E8ac09
